item.title: Overflowing Bins, not collected, 23rd August
item.description:
Recycling Bins are not being used or collected appropriately, they are overflowing and haven’t been collected for some time. They are an eye sore for those houses overlooking them.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bridge Gardens, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: British flags put up on lampposts along Nuxkey Road, 23rd August
item.description:
I asked in a shop if they knew who had put the flags up and apparently 2 men on a bike with a ladder did it late one night. Not only is this vandalism of public property, but also may be linked to far-right groups.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nuxley Road, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter bin full of waste at 11 Chiltern Street, 23rd August
item.description:
The public bin located outside the 11 Chiltern street next to monocle is full of litter and waste. The bin need to be emptied

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22-30, Chiltern Street, Marylebone, London

item.title: Mattress under bridge, 23rd August

item.title: Drainage, 23rd August
item.description:
The drainage does not work and is always flooding. This has been reported to the Bamboo restaurant owners who has taken no action and has been going on for nearly half a year. The drainage water is flooding neighbouring properties and pathways to the back flats and the main road out front. The water is very murky and the drainage is clearly not up-kept properly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Oxford Mews, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mabley Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Overgrown garden onto the footpath, 23rd August
item.description:
The occupants of the 3 houses going towards the park on the left side of crossmead have let their bushes get too big and it's hard to walk to the park without going into the road to avoid them. Particular bad for people with prams or disabled people.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Crossmead, Mottingham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped boxes, 23rd August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Vestry Road, Camberwell, London

item.title: Tree roots under path trip hazard, 23rd August
item.description:
The footpath is uneven here due to tree roots under the path. There have been 8 fallers here at the Saturday morning parkrun, some of the injuries have been severe.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dirty playground London fields north area, 23rd August
item.description:
The condition of the playground is unacceptable the litter is scattered around, and the facilities are not being properly cleaned. The bins on-site also urgently need attention.The large waste bins placed at the entrance be removed, as they attract flies!!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Martello Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
